items.title: NFL Winners and Losers: Drake Maye stays in the NFL MVP conversation with a nearly perfect day in blowout of Jets
items.summary: Drake Maye threw a career best 5 touchdowns in an easy Patriots win against the Jets.

items.title: Ja'Marr Chase has two TD catches as Bengals breeze past Cardinals 37-14
items.summary: Ja'Marr Chase caught two touchdown passes from Joe Burrow, who threw for 305 yards as the Cincinnati Bengals beat the Arizona Cardinals 37-14 on Sunday.  Chase finished with seven catches for 60 yards and became the first player in NFL history with at least 80 receptions, 1,000 receiving yards and seven TD catches in each of his first five seasons.

items.title: Henry up to 10th all time in rushing, Ravens win
items.summary: Baltimore running back Derrick Henry moved into 10th place all time in NFL rushing yards Saturday night, finishing with 216, to go along with four touchdowns on the ground, as the Ravens produced a 41-24 win over the Green Bay Packers at Lambeau Field.
